channel.title: Phoenix Online 718/753
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HeZvOYW.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/cmps_index.php"]Website[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/forum.php"]Forums[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/play.html"]Webclient[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/vote"]Vote[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/highscores"]Highscores[/URL]
Welcome to the Phoenix Online Advertisement post.
Owners of Phoenix Online: Adam Jake
Staff is needed! Just apply on the forums.*
[/CENTER] [HR][/HR][U][B][SIZE=4] Phoenix Online Content:[/SIZE][/B][/U]
[B]vBulletin Forums[/B] [B]Custom Webclient[/B]
[B][SIZE=5]Server Features:[/SIZE][/B]
[ul][*][B]New Zombie Mini-Game[/B] [*][B]New Dungeoneering System[/B] [*][B]753 Items & Interfaces[/B] [*][B]Boss Contracts[/B] [*][B]All Skills are fully functioning [/B] [*][B]Automated Double EXP Weekends ( Friday, Saturday, Sunday. )[/B] [*][B]Title Shops ( Requirements are needed for titles.)[/B][/ul]
[SIZE=4][B]
[ul][*]Difficulty Selections[/ul]
[/B][/SIZE] [B]- Choose difficulty on login for the first time[/B] [B]- Can not go to a harder difficulty until you prestige[/B] [B]- After prestiging, can only go harder if you havent gained any exp[/B] [B]- Can go to an easier difficulty at any time[/B] [B]- Harder difficulties increase drop rates, but lower the exp rate[/B] [B]- Easier difficulties decrease drop rates, but higher the exp rate [/B]Prestige System ( New & Improved )
[ul][*]Prestige System ( New & Improved )[/ul]
- [B]6 prestige levels in total (more levels in the future ) [/B] [B]
[ul][*][SIZE=4]Skilling Rewards[/SIZE][/ul]
- Each skill action you gain 1 skill point[/B] - [B]Skill Point shop to get exp boosting items[/B]
[ul][*][B][SIZE=4]PvP System[/SIZE][/B][/ul]
- [B]Pk Points per kill[/B] - [B]Killstreaks[/B] - [B]Leaderboards in-game[/B] - [B]PkP Shop [/B]
[ul][*][B][SIZE=4]Loyalty Points[/SIZE][/B][/ul]
- [B]Awarded 250 points every 30 minutes[/B] - [B]Custom titles for loyal members[/B] - [B]Auras[/B]
[ul][*][B][SIZE=4]Squeal of Fortune[/SIZE][/B][/ul]
- [B]Awarded 2 spins every 24 hours[/B] - [B]Works perfect[/B]
[SIZE=4][B]Bosses: [/B][/SIZE] Godwars:
- [B]Bandos[/B] [IMG]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/7916/z2ob.png[/img]
- [B]Armadyl[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xCOZx4i.png[/img]
- [B]Saradomin[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/F0jVchL.png[/img]
- [B]Zamorak[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6nhQVeo.png[/img]
- [B]Nex[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HshpjT4.png[/img]
[HR][/HR]
- [B]King Black Dragon[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Mz74a94.png[/img]
- [B]Queen Black Dragon[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XO3G1Ez.png[/img]
- [B]Corps Beast[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pqv7zHU.png[/img]
& Much more Bosses to fight! [HR][/HR]
Crystal Key Chest at home! Look at the rewards! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6CA9qVY.png[/img]
[CENTER][B][U][FONT=Comic Sans MS]There's so much content for players! Why don't you find out for yourself? Join today! And play against the Mighty and the Strong! Phoenix Online![/FONT][/U][/B]
* More Media will be added *[/CENTER]

[B]- Harder difficulties increase drop rates, but lower the exp rate[/B]
[B]- Easier difficulties decrease drop rates, but higher the exp rate
[/B]Prestige System ( New & Improved )
